name.title: Name
name.description: Name of the plasma source device.

powerValue.title: Input power [W]
powerValue.description: Total input power coupled into the system.

reflectedPower.title: Reflected power [%]
reflectedPower.description: Part of the input power which is reflected and not coupled to the electrode.

dcOffsetValue.title: DC offset [V]
dcOffsetValue.description: DC offset for voltage or current signal.

burstMode.title: Burst mode
burstMode.description: Power supply mode where the voltage signal is switched between on and off mode.

burstPeriodValue.title: Burst period [s]
burstPeriodValue.description: Time from the start of one burst to the start of next burst.

burstCountValue.title: Burst counts
burstCountValue.description: Number of cycles in on mode.

gasMix.title: Gas (mixture)
gasMix.description: Gas or gas mixture in which the plasma is ignited.

gasFlowRateValue.title: Gas flow rate [slm]
gasFlowRateValue.description: Flow rate of the gas (mixture) in which the plasma is ignited.
